title: Top Cheque Visual
text:
library(cma)
my_cheque <- mini_long_() |> nosolde_() |> cheque_() 
my_cheque |> dplyr::filter(abs(value)> 4000)

                           libelle year month     period    dc     value
 1: CHEQUE 0438705 A022-7114-00111 2012     2 2012-02-01 debit  -4600.40
 2: CHEQUE 0707961 T284-6115-00111 2014     6 2014-06-01 debit  -5688.00
 3: CHEQUE 1398706 T084-1014-00111 2017     8 2017-08-01 debit  -7224.82
 4: CHEQUE 1637297 S027-7866-00111 2018    10 2018-10-01 debit  -4310.02
 5: CHEQUE 1637302 S096-4126-00111 2018    10 2018-10-01 debit  -4500.00
 6: CHEQUE 1711018 S202-2719-00111 2019     7 2019-07-01 debit -12417.62
 7: CHEQUE 1933600 T026-6102-00111 2020     8 2020-08-01 debit  -4558.00
 8: CHEQUE 1933608 S034-9951-00111 2020     9 2020-09-01 debit  -5000.00
 9:   VIR SEPA MLE MICHELE FISCHER 2020    12 2020-12-01 debit  -5000.00
10: CHEQUE 2017800 S021-0365-00111 2021     2 2021-02-01 debit  -7232.95
11: CHEQUE 2079702 S285-0102-00111 2021     9 2021-09-01 debit -20000.00
              var
 1: chq-vir-debit
 2: chq-vir-debit
 3: chq-vir-debit
 4: chq-vir-debit
 5: chq-vir-debit
 6: chq-vir-debit
 7: chq-vir-debit
 8: chq-vir-debit
 9: chq-vir-debit
10: chq-vir-debit
11: chq-vir-debit



nosolde_()[,.(value=sum(value)),.(var,period)] |>
  dplyr::group_by(var) |>
  dplyr::mutate(value= cumsum(value)) |>
  dplyr::arrange(var,period) |>
  ggplot2::ggplot(mapping= ggplot2::aes(x= period, y=value, color= var)) +
  ggplot2::geom_line()




This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.
